channel.title: Darkened Combat 317/602
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/mnjRF.gif[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/2qikM.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/AQ8y1.jpg[/img]
[SIZE="3"][COLOR="Red"]Welcome to the Darkened Combat advertisement thread![/COLOR][/SIZE]
[COLOR="DarkOrange"]Unique features:
[ul][*]All dungeoneering items. [*]Great up-time. [*]VBulletin Forums. [*]Friendly and helpful staff. [*]A helpdesk for all those in need. [*]3 awesome donator ranks. [*]A big donator point shop. [*]Loads of bosses. [*]Torva, Pernix and Virtus armour. [*]Small yet welcoming community. [*]Regular drop parties and Hide 'n' Seeks. [*]Awesome Rep feature on forums. [*]A refferal system which gives you cash for bringing someone onto the server. [*]Amazing donator zones. [*]Coloured and custom loyalty titles. [*]One-of-a-kind staff crowns. [*]Regular player and donator content updates. [*]Working Dragon Claws spec. [*]All working curses with emotes and effects. [*]TWO worlds. One ECO one PK. [*]100% Dicing using a dice bag. Can be clan rolled, public rolled or private rolled. [*]All working skills and custom dungeoneering.[/ul] [/COLOR] [COLOR="Orange"]Primal[/COLOR] [COLOR="Wheat"]Sagittarian[/COLOR] [COLOR="YellowGreen"]Celestial[/COLOR] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/JQ6ZF.png[/img]
[COLOR="Plum"]Pernix Torva Virtus[/COLOR] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/OSgfl.png[/img]
[COLOR="Red"]Donator point shop[/COLOR] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/U08px.png[/img]
[COLOR="Yellow"]FunPK and Curses[/COLOR] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Tx7PJ.png[/img]
[COLOR="White"]Neat and useful quest tab [/COLOR] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/DxcgD.png[/img]
[COLOR="DeepSkyBlue"]Help command which teleports you to the help desk[/COLOR] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/1BS8Q.png[/img]
[COLOR="Magenta"]Regular donator tab[/COLOR] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/0fcIH.png[/img]
[COLOR="Lime"]Custom quests with rewards and guide[/COLOR] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/qd7MQ.png[/img]
[COLOR="Silver"]Crystal key chest with nice rewards[/COLOR] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/vkFsz.png[/img]
[COLOR="MediumTurquoise"]Name change command for donators[/COLOR] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/BHg7l.png[/img]
[COLOR="DarkRed"]Classic Edgeville home[/COLOR] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/x2IJK.png[/img]
[COLOR="PaleGreen"]Awesome training teleports for new players[/COLOR] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/U7xEk.png[/img]
[COLOR="Blue"]Friendly and caring owner[/COLOR] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/An2il.png[/img]
[COLOR="LemonChiffon"]Loads of bosses to fight[/COLOR] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/l8JyP.png[/img]
Links:

AQ8y1.jpg1022×582

[SIZE=“3”][COLOR=“Red”]Welcome to the Darkened Combat advertisement thread![/COLOR][/SIZE]

[COLOR=“DarkOrange”]Unique features:

[ul][]All dungeoneering items.
[]Great up-time.
[]VBulletin Forums.
[]Friendly and helpful staff.
[]A helpdesk for all those in need.
[]3 awesome donator ranks.
[]A big donator point shop.
[]Loads of bosses.
[]Torva, Pernix and Virtus armour.
[]Small yet welcoming community.
[]Regular drop parties and Hide ‘n’ Seeks.
[]Awesome Rep feature on forums.
[]A refferal system which gives you cash for bringing someone onto the server.
[]Amazing donator zones.
[]Coloured and custom loyalty titles.
[]One-of-a-kind staff crowns.
[]Regular player and donator content updates.
[]Working Dragon Claws spec.
[]All working curses with emotes and effects.
[]TWO worlds. One ECO one PK.
[]100% Dicing using a dice bag. Can be clan rolled, public rolled or private rolled.
[]All working skills and custom dungeoneering.[/ul]
[/COLOR]
